title: Get an S- with box available, get no box? what happened?
body: i just want my darn crate man.

replies.body: What champ was this for?  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide there's quite a few requirements.  You'll need to own the champion, and not already have received one with them this season.

Can you get a chest for onslaught?
Or does it not work because it's not pvp?
Nope!  Mastery points and chests are unavailable for the current game mode.
Ahhhh, i get it now. I did own them, but had gotten a chest about a month ago. Thank you.
